diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,88 @@
+from torch.autograd import Function
+from torch._thnn import type2backend
+import torch.cuda.cudnn as cudnn
+import torch.cuda.cudnn.conv
+
+
+class Conv2d(Function):
+    def __init__(self, stride, pad, groups):
+        super(Conv2d, self).__init__()
+        self.stride = stride
+        self.pad = pad
+        self.groups = groups
+
+    def forward(self, input, weight, bias=None):
+        output = input.new(*self._output_size(input, weight))
+        if bias is not None:
+            self.save_for_backward(input, weight, bias)
+        else:
+            self.save_for_backward(input, weight)
+
+        if cudnn.is_acceptable(input):
+            cudnn.conv.forward(self, input, weight, bias, output)
+        else:
+            backend = type2backend[type(input)]
body: I'll add an error for now. I'll be adding groups support for THNN convs in a later commit
